title: Westcott 15234 2-Hole Manual Crayon and Pencil Sharpener for School, Assorted Colors
description: Westcott 2-hole pencil sharpener can be used for both crayons and classic #2 pencils! The perfect size for pencil case storage, it's ideal for use in the home or classroom. A translucent reservoir neatly stores shavings. Sharpeners are available in assorted colors (color can't be specified when ordered). Westcott is dedicated to supporting education and inspiring creative activities in the classroom and at home. Products are specifically designed for growing students, created to be fun and functional with superior quality and exceptional value.
